duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with Personal Injury litigation and Employment Wage & Hour Class Action matters
Conduct legal research and analysis using specialized tools
Prepare and manage legal documents and case files
Coordinate with attorneys and clients for case management
Maintain case calendars and assist with scheduling
Prepare and organize evidence and exhibits for trial

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree and paralegal certification from an accredited institution
Good standing with the California State Bar as a paralegal
